thread.section_title: Point A Hotel, London Canary Wharf - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Handy
thread.title_full: Handy - Review of Point A Hotel, London Canary Wharf, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: J H
title: Handy
text:
Even though the hotel has changed its name the standards are still the same, the hotel painless check in and the slightly basic room continues to be consistent and reliable stay, if you are looking for a room only stay.
There is a vast choice of places to eat in the local area, and plenty of local amenities if you need anything.
